text: Hmm, I’m not aware of an implementation; would definitely be a good addition! Would refer to <https://arxiv.org/abs/1807.04489> and <http://proceedings.mlr.press/v84/salimbeni18a/salimbeni18a.pdf> for a nice way of implementing them.

text:
BTW, I recently supervised a student to implement a very smart version of it in Jax, without using second order derivatives.
That is fast. Really fast.
I think it could be a nice starting point.
